Node.definition: = action by which one utters words with a set or improvised tune, whether accompanied by musical instruments and dancing or not
= woman; ► wife of Lappidoth (לַפִּידֹות) prophetess (נְבִיאָה) warrior and judge of Israel (יִשְׂרָאֵל) in the pre monarchical period
= man; ◄ son of Abinoam (אֲבִינֹעַם) of the tribe of Naphtali (נַפְתָּלִי) ► a military commander of Israel (יִשְׂרָאֵל) in the time of judge Deborah (דְּבֹורָה)
= direct or indirect human offspring, either male or indeterminate, either biologically or through adoption
= man; ◄ father of Barak (בָּרָק)

= a basic unit of time, including evening (עֶרֶב) and morning (בֹּקֶר) seven days make a week (שְׁבוּעָה) sometimes used in a figurative sense referring to a limited period of time, which may be shorter or slightly longer than a single day; the context often makes it difficult to determine
= referent to a male person or another object that is considered masculine

Node.gloss: to say|to speak|to tell|to command|to think|to call
Node.definition: = action by which humans and deities utter words; this can happen within their minds and be inaudible to others, but in most cases the words are spoken out loud in order to communicate something to others; usually directly followed by the actual words that are spoken

= man, also known as Jacob (יַעֲקֹב) and Jeshurun (יְשֻׁרוּן) including the ethnic group that is regarded to be his descendants; ◄ son of Isaac (יִצְחָק) and Rebekah (רִבְקָה) brother of Esau (עֵשָׂו) and ► father of twelve sons after whom the tribes of Israel were named and one daughter

Node.gloss: to offer oneself freely|to offer oneself willingly|to volunteer
Node.definition: literally: to impel oneself; hence: = state in which humans are willing to perform a certain task and show that by their actions

Node.gloss: to bless|to praise|to greet|to congratulate|to commend
Node.definition: = causative action by which deities grant a special favor to humans, objects, or events, or by which humans invoke a deity to do the same
= deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses
= supreme secular and male ruler of a nation or people; ≈ associated with authority, power, honor, but also with justice; also used as a reference to one's deity
= to make an effort to hear the words spoken by someone else
used in poetry only; = ruler of a nation or people
= referent to the speaker or writer in a discourse
= deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses
= referent to the speaker or writer in a discourse
= action by which one utters words with a set or improvised tune, whether accompanied by musical instruments and dancing or not
= action by which one expresses one's respect and gratitude to someone else by uttering words at a set or improvised tune, whether accompanied by musical instruments and dancing or not
= deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses
plural with singular meaning: = generic term for a supernatural being, worshiped by individuals or entire nations

= man, also known as Jacob (יַעֲקֹב) and Jeshurun (יְשֻׁרוּן) including the ethnic group that is regarded to be his descendants; ◄ son of Isaac (יִצְחָק) and Rebekah (רִבְקָה) brother of Esau (עֵשָׂו) and ► father of twelve sons after whom the tribes of Israel were named and one daughter
= deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses

Node.gloss: to go out|to come out|to go away|to leave|to depart
Node.definition: = action by which humans, animals, or objects leave a certain place or position
= mountainous area east of the Jordan (יַרְדֵּן) valley and south of Moab (מֹואָב) first inhabited by the Horites (חֹרִי) and later by the Edomites (אֲדֹומִי)
= action by which humans or deities move purposefully in a certain direction
= the territory or rural region of a people group
= nation; ◄ considered descendants of Esau (עֵשָׂו)

= the earth as opposed to the sky; sometimes used in a more specific sense to denote part of the earth, such as the dry land as opposed to the sea, or a specific region, area, country, or plot of land

Node.gloss: also|too|even|moreover|what is more|what is worse|furthermore|besides|both … and
Node.definition: marker pointing to information that needs to be considered in addition to previous information (either explicit or implied)

= the area above the earth, the location of sun, moon, and stars, the realm of the birds and God's primary residence; seen as the source of dew, rain, hail, snow, thunder and lightning, and sometimes even food; associated with what is high and remote, created by God and bound to disappear one day

Node.gloss: also|too|even|moreover|what is more|what is worse|furthermore|besides|both … and
Node.definition: marker pointing to information that needs to be considered in addition to previous information (either explicit or implied)
= mass of visible, condensed watery vapor floating in the air; ► producing rain; ≈ God is said to envelop himself with clouds
= a relatively high elevation of the earth’s surface; generally higher than a hill (גִּבְעָה)
= process by which an object is shaking with force, ◄ as if trembling with fear
= deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses
= mountain and surrounding desert on the Sinai Peninsula in Egypt, also known as Mount Horeb (חֹורֵב) ► location where YHWH (יהוה) entered into a covenant (בְּרִית) with Israel (יִשְׂרָאֵל)
= deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses
plural with singular meaning: = generic term for a supernatural being, worshiped by individuals or entire nations

= man, also known as Jacob (יַעֲקֹב) and Jeshurun (יְשֻׁרוּן) including the ethnic group that is regarded to be his descendants; ◄ son of Isaac (יִצְחָק) and Rebekah (רִבְקָה) brother of Esau (עֵשָׂו) and ► father of twelve sons after whom the tribes of Israel were named and one daughter
literally: days; hence: = an unspecified amount of time
= man; ◄ son of Anath (עֲנָת) ► judge of Israel (יִשְׂרָאֵל) who killed 600 Philistines (פְּלִשְׁתִּי) with an ox goad (מַלְמַד)
= direct or indirect human offspring, either male or indeterminate, either biologically or through adoption
= man; ► father of Shamgar (שַׁמְגַּר) judge of Israel (יִשְׂרָאֵל)
literally: days; hence: = an unspecified amount of time
= woman; ◄ wife of Heber (חֶבֶר) Kenite (קֵינִי) ► time of the Judges
= process by which objects stop existing in this world
= relatively narrow road (דֶּרֶךְ) that connects two locations and facilitates travelling|= group of travelling merchants
= person who spends much time on the road, either as well intentioned traveller or as roaming vagabond
= action by which humans, deities, or animals move forward, usually towards a specific destination
= relatively narrow road (דֶּרֶךְ) that connects two locations and facilitates travelling
= process by which objects stop existing in this world
= class of people living in villages and other unfortified population centers in the rural areas

= man, also known as Jacob (יַעֲקֹב) and Jeshurun (יְשֻׁרוּן) including the ethnic group that is regarded to be his descendants; ◄ son of Isaac (יִצְחָק) and Rebekah (רִבְקָה) brother of Esau (עֵשָׂו) and ► father of twelve sons after whom the tribes of Israel were named and one daughter
= process by which objects stop existing in this world
particle linking two events; = relation indicating that event X ends at the time of occurrence or completion of event Y
= woman; ► wife of Lappidoth (לַפִּידֹות) prophetess (נְבִיאָה) warrior and judge of Israel (יִשְׂרָאֵל) in the pre monarchical period
= direct female progenitor; ≈ associated with affection and loyalty; often extended figuratively to refer to other objects that are regarded as feminine

= man, also known as Jacob (יַעֲקֹב) and Jeshurun (יְשֻׁרוּן) including the ethnic group that is regarded to be his descendants; ◄ son of Isaac (יִצְחָק) and Rebekah (רִבְקָה) brother of Esau (עֵשָׂו) and ► father of twelve sons after whom the tribes of Israel were named and one daughter
= action by which someone makes a selection among several options, which include humans, divine beings, animals, other objects, or events
plural with plural meaning: = generic term for a supernatural being, worshiped by individuals or entire nations
= state in which an object or event is different from other objects or events implied or identified in a certain context ◄ because of having recently been introduced
= referent pointing to a specific point in time, either in the past or the future
exact meaning unsure; probably: = action by which humans engage in a confrontation with other humans; alternatively: = a person engaged in a confrontation with other humans

= particle linking two events and denoting that X takes places in order to establish whether Y is true or not; X is often elided, which turns the remainder of the phrase into a question, which is often rhetorical

Node.gloss: to be seen|to become visible|to appear
Node.definition: = process by which humans, deities, or objects become perceptible, primarily though not necessarily exclusively to the eye

= a flat, usually round, object; made of wood or metal; ► used in battle; held by a warrior in front of him as protection from the weapons of his opponent; relatively small and easy to maneuver; ≈ associated with protection and therefore often used as an epithet for God
= a long, straight rod, usually made of wood, with a sharp iron (בַּרְזֶל) head or point; used for piercing by thrusting; its length varied from the height of a man to much longer
= state in which a countable entity is forty in number
= pertaining to being a thousand in number or to happening a thousand times

= man, also known as Jacob (יַעֲקֹב) and Jeshurun (יְשֻׁרוּן) including the ethnic group that is regarded to be his descendants; ◄ son of Isaac (יִצְחָק) and Rebekah (רִבְקָה) brother of Esau (עֵשָׂו) and ► father of twelve sons after whom the tribes of Israel were named and one daughter
literally: heart; hence: = the seat of knowledge, human reasoning, planning, intelligence, skill, affection and hatred, desire and satisfaction, humility and pride, courage and fear, joy and grief
literally: one who decrees; hence: = person who is in a position of authority over other people

= man, also known as Jacob (יַעֲקֹב) and Jeshurun (יְשֻׁרוּן) including the ethnic group that is regarded to be his descendants; ◄ son of Isaac (יִצְחָק) and Rebekah (רִבְקָה) brother of Esau (עֵשָׂו) and ► father of twelve sons after whom the tribes of Israel were named and one daughter

Node.gloss: to offer oneself freely|to offer oneself willingly|to volunteer
Node.definition: literally: to impel oneself; hence: = state in which humans are willing to perform a certain task and show that by their actions

Node.gloss: to bless|to praise|to greet|to congratulate|to commend
Node.definition: = causative action by which deities grant a special favor to humans, objects, or events, or by which humans invoke a deity to do the same
= deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses
= action by which humans ride on a domestic animal such as a donkey (חֲמֹור) or a horse (סוּס) or in a chariot (מֶרְכָּבָה)
= large, strong, female donkey (חֲמֹור) ► used for riding
exact meaning unsure: = color of a shade between grey brown and white
= action by which humans assume a sitting position in a certain location and remain in that position for some time; ≈ sometimes associated with a certain status, role, or common activity

exact meaning unsure; possibly: = piece of skin or cloth, woven out of animal hair; ► used as a covering for the bare ground so that one can sit on|exact meaning unsure; possibly: = piece of skin or cloth, woven out of animal hair; ► used to cover the back of a riding animal
= action by which humans, deities, or animals move forward, usually towards a specific destination

= an open space connecting different places, ► used for travelling and transportation; ≈ often extended to denote our life as a journey from birth to death, and the totality of our activities during our lives
= action by which humans utter words with the focus on what is said
= to divide an object into portions and share them out among a group of people
= the area separating two or mores locations

= action of humans or deities that is in accordance with the requirements of the divine law and and generally aimed at establishing or restoring this type of behavior as a standard, which often requires a victory over evil and results in prosperity and happiness
= deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses

= action of humans or deities that is in accordance with the requirements of the divine law and and generally aimed at establishing or restoring this type of behavior as a standard, which often requires a victory over evil and results in prosperity and happiness
= class of people living in villages and other unfortified population centers in the rural areas

= man, also known as Jacob (יַעֲקֹב) and Jeshurun (יְשֻׁרוּן) including the ethnic group that is regarded to be his descendants; ◄ son of Isaac (יִצְחָק) and Rebekah (רִבְקָה) brother of Esau (עֵשָׂו) and ► father of twelve sons after whom the tribes of Israel were named and one daughter
= referent pointing to a specific point in time, either in the past or the future

Node.gloss: to go down|to come down|to climb down|to step down|to descend
Node.definition: = action by which human, animals, or deities move (voluntarily) from a place that is relatively high in elevation to a relatively lower place
= deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses
= action by which someone ends a period of inactivity and comes into action, ◄ as if he had been sleeping for a certain time
= action by which someone ends a period of inactivity and comes into action, ◄ as if he had been sleeping for a certain time
= woman; ► wife of Lappidoth (לַפִּידֹות) prophetess (נְבִיאָה) warrior and judge of Israel (יִשְׂרָאֵל) in the pre monarchical period
= action by which someone ends a period of inactivity and comes into action, ◄ as if he had been sleeping for a certain time
= action by which someone ends a period of inactivity and comes into action, ◄ as if he had been sleeping for a certain time

= action by which humans and deities utter words; this can happen within their minds and be inaudible to others, but in most cases the words are spoken out loud in order to communicate something to others; usually not directly followed by the actual words that are spoken
= man; ◄ son of Abinoam (אֲבִינֹעַם) of the tribe of Naphtali (נַפְתָּלִי) ► a military commander of Israel (יִשְׂרָאֵל) in the time of judge Deborah (דְּבֹורָה)
= causative action by which people, animals or objects are forcibly carried off; ► in the case of people, into slavery or exile
= a person or group that has been forcibly carried off to prison, into slavery, or resettlement
= direct or indirect human offspring, either male or indeterminate, either biologically or through adoption
= man; ◄ father of Barak (בָּרָק)
= referent pointing to a specific point in time, either in the past or the future
read ירד (ירד)
= a person who was able to flee from danger
= person in a position of leadership, either within the community or within the army
= deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses
read ירד (ירד)
= a human being, animal, or supernatural being who is renowned for his characteristics, such as physical strength, power, bravery, skill, wealth, good character, or a combination thereof
= man, tribe, and territory; ◄ son of Joseph (יֹוסֵף) ► founder of tribe of Israel (יִשְׂרָאֵל)
= a part of a plant normally below ground, which acts as a support and collects water and nourishment, ≈ associated with well being, offspring, and the inclination of the mind
= ethnic group living a nomadic existence; ◄ regarded as decendants of Esau (עֵשָׂו) ► regarded as mortal enemies of Israel (יִשְׂרָאֵל) ultimately destroyed by Saul (שָׁאוּל)
= particle linking two elements and indicating that X is located or takes place behind Y
= man (called Ben Oni (בֶּן־אֹונִי) by his mother), tribe, and territory; ◄ twelfth and last son of Jacob (יַעֲקֹב) and second son of Rachel (רָחֵל) ► founder of tribe of Israel (יִשְׂרָאֵל)
= man; ◄ son of Manasseh (מְנַשֶּׁה) ► father of Gilead (גִּלְעָד)

Node.gloss: to go down|to come down|to climb down|to step down|to descend
Node.definition: = action by which human, animals, or deities move (voluntarily) from a place that is relatively high in elevation to a relatively lower place
literally: one who decrees; hence: = person who is in a position of authority over other people
= man, tribe, and territory; ◄ tenth son of Jacob (יַעֲקֹב) and sixth son of Leah (לֵאָה) ► founder of tribe of Israel
= action by which humans move as a group from one location to another
= stick ◄ usually made of wood; ► attribute of a shepherd or a ruler, but also used for other purposes, such as beating, walking, fighting, etc.; ≈ associated with shepherding, authority, punishment

= a high ranking official, usually learned, who served in the king's court and was responsible for the king's official business ► held some authority in administrative and financial, and perhaps also military matters
= someone in a position of authority in an army, at a royal court, of a town, within a family, among priests, or elsewhere
= man, tribe, and territory; ◄ ninth son of Jacob (יַעֲקֹב) and fifth son of Leah (לֵאָה) ► founder of tribe of Israel (יִשְׂרָאֵל)
= woman; ► wife of Lappidoth (לַפִּידֹות) prophetess (נְבִיאָה) warrior and judge of Israel (יִשְׂרָאֵל) in the pre monarchical period
= man, tribe, and territory; ◄ ninth son of Jacob (יַעֲקֹב) and fifth son of Leah (לֵאָה) ► founder of tribe of Israel (יִשְׂרָאֵל)
= man; ◄ son of Abinoam (אֲבִינֹעַם) of the tribe of Naphtali (נַפְתָּלִי) ► a military commander of Israel (יִשְׂרָאֵל) in the time of judge Deborah (דְּבֹורָה)
= causative action by which humans or deities commission one or more agents to go to a certain individual or place in order to perform a certain task
literally: at the feet; hence: = a reference to the location behind a moving party
= man, tribe, and territory; ◄ first son of Jacob (יַעֲקֹב) and Leah (לֵאָה) ► founder of tribe of Israel (יִשְׂרָאֵל)
= state in which an event has a high intensity
literally, possibly: inquiries of heart; hence: = action by which humans reflect on a certain matter in order to make a well founded decision
literally: heart; hence: = the seat of knowledge, human reasoning, planning, intelligence, skill, affection and hatred, desire and satisfaction, humility and pride, courage and fear, joy and grief
= state in which humans remain in a place that is not their home for a relatively short time
= the area separating two or mores locations

meaning unsure; possibly: = area enclosed by a stone wall or hedge made of branches and thorns, with a narrow opening which can be closed with brush or by the shepherd’s body; ► used for keeping sheep at night to protect them from thieves or wild animals
= a large group of domesticated mammals that moves and stays together, either in an enclosure or in a open area ◄ usually sheep or goats, but can also include camels or cattle
= man, tribe, and territory; ◄ first son of Jacob (יַעֲקֹב) and Leah (לֵאָה) ► founder of tribe of Israel (יִשְׂרָאֵל)
= state in which an event has a high intensity
= action by which someone makes an effort to obtain information about events
literally: heart; hence: = the seat of knowledge, human reasoning, planning, intelligence, skill, affection and hatred, desire and satisfaction, humility and pride, courage and fear, joy and grief

= man; ◄ son of Makir (מָכִיר) tribe of Manasseh (מְנַשֶּׁה) ► settler of the area on the east side of the Jordan (יַרְדֵּן)|= area on east side of the Jordan (יַרְדֵּן) ◄ supposedly named after Gilead, son of Makir (מָכִיר) tribe of Manasseh (מְנַשֶּׁה)
= river; ◄ flowing from Mount Hermon (חֶרְמֹון) in a southerly direction through the Sea of Galilee (כִּנֶּרֶת) into the Dead Sea (יָם־הַמֶּלַח)
= man, tribe, and territory; ◄ fifth son of Jacob (יַעֲקֹב) and first son of Bilhah (בִּלְהָה) slave of Rachel (רָחֵל) ► founder of a tribe

Node.gloss: to sojourn|to live as alien|to dwell
Node.definition: = state in which humans live in a place which is not their place of origin or nationality, either permanently or for a substantial period of time
= boat ◄ of a relatively large size ► that is able to sail the sea or ocean
= man, tribe, and territory; ◄ eighth son of Jacob (יַעֲקֹב) and second son of Zilpah (זִלְפָּה) slave of Leah (לֵאָה) ► founder of tribe of Israel (יִשְׂרָאֵל)
= state in which humans remain in a place that is not their home for a relatively short time
= area along the coast
literally: the sea; hence: = a large body of salt water located between Europe and Africa, west of Canaan/Israel
= man, tribe, and territory; ◄ tenth son of Jacob (יַעֲקֹב) and sixth son of Leah (לֵאָה) ► founder of tribe of Israel

Node.gloss: to scorn (one's) life > to be very brave
Node.definition: literally: to scorn one's life; hence: = state in which humans are extremely courageous ◄ as if one attributes no value to one's life

literally: throat, as the part of the body that contains the passage ways for blood, air, and food; hence: = the life principle that animates both humans and animals, turns them into breathing living beings, and functions as the center of their personality, mind, physical and non physical desires, courage, emotions, and affections; it is believed to reside in the blood
= process by which humans or animals stop living, either spontaneously or as a result of an act of aggression
= man, tribe, and territory; ◄ sixth son of Jacob (יַעֲקֹב) and second son of Bilhah (בִּלְהָה) slave of Rachel (רָחֵל) ► founder of tribe of Israel (יִשְׂרָאֵל)

= a piece of land generally uninhabited by human beings, but where one can find wild animals and plants and trees; consists of grasslands, fields, desert, or forest; can be used for farming, pasturing animals, and hunting; often used in contrast to inhabited land such as cities or encampments.
= supreme secular and male ruler of a nation or people; ≈ associated with authority, power, honor, but also with justice; also used as a reference to one's deity
= action by which humans or deities engage in a confrontation with (other) humans
= referent pointing to a specific point in time, either in the past or the future
= action by which humans or deities engage in a confrontation with (other) humans
= supreme secular and male ruler of a nation or people; ≈ associated with authority, power, honor, but also with justice; also used as a reference to one's deity
= the region inhabited by people who were regarded as descendants of Canaan, son of Ham (חָם) son of Noah (נֹחַ) settled by Abram (אַבְרָם)
= town; ◄ territory of Manasseh (מְנַשֶּׁה) west of river Jordan (יַרְדֵּן) ► assigned to clan of Kohath (קְהָת) tribe of Levi (לֵוִי)

= town; ◄ located to the southwest of Valley of Jizreel (יִזְרְעֶאל) territory of Manasseh (מְנַשֶּׁה) ► former Canaanite (כְּנַעֲנִי) kingdom; location where king Josiah (יֹאשִׁיָּהוּ) of Judah (יְהוּדָה) was killed during his battle with Pharaoh Neco (נְכֹה)
= possessions accumulated through advantageous transactions, in which part of the income can be kept for oneself, mostly achieved in an unjust way
= silver, usually in the form of small unstamped pieces that had to be weighed in order to determine their value; after the exile, people in Israel started using coins

= the area above the earth, the location of sun, moon, and stars, the realm of the birds and God's primary residence; seen as the source of dew, rain, hail, snow, thunder and lightning, and sometimes even food; associated with what is high and remote, created by God and bound to disappear one day
= action by which humans or deities engage in a confrontation with (other) humans

= celestial body, providing light, and assisting the sun and moon in ruling day and night; ◄ created and controled by the divine; ≈ associated with a high and elevated position and sometimes personified as creatures that can sing and wage war
literally: highway; hence: = the trajectory of a celestial object
= action by which humans or deities engage in a confrontation with (other) humans
= man; ► army commander of Jabin (יָבִין) king of Hazor (חָצֹור)
= a relatively steep and narrow valley following the course of a stream, which is often dry, except for the rainy season

= river; ◄ that drains the western portion of the Plain of Esdraelon from Megiddo (מְגִדֹּו) to the sea, fed by springs from Gilboa (גִּלְבֹּעַ) and the foot of the Carmel (כַּרְמֶל) range; ► location where Sisera (סִיסְרָא) was defeated and where Elijah (אֵלִיָּהוּ) killed the prophets of Baal (בַּעַל)
= causative action by which a body of water removes humans from their place with force
= a relatively steep and narrow valley following the course of a stream, which is often dry, except for the rainy season
= pertaining to having been in existence for a very long time
= a relatively steep and narrow valley following the course of a stream, which is often dry, except for the rainy season

= river; ◄ that drains the western portion of the Plain of Esdraelon from Megiddo (מְגִדֹּו) to the sea, fed by springs from Gilboa (גִּלְבֹּעַ) and the foot of the Carmel (כַּרְמֶל) range; ► location where Sisera (סִיסְרָא) was defeated and where Elijah (אֵלִיָּהוּ) killed the prophets of Baal (בַּעַל)

Node.gloss: to tread|to set foot (on something)|to march|to move
Node.definition: = action by which humans or animals move forward by lifting and setting down each foot in turn
= state in which a person, supernatural being, animal, substance, or force has the ability to exert great force

literally: throat, as the part of the body that contains the passage ways for blood, air, and food; hence: = the life principle that animates both humans and animals, turns them into breathing living beings, and functions as the center of their personality, mind, physical and non physical desires, courage, emotions, and affections; it is believed to reside in the blood
= referent pointing to a specific point in time, either in the past or the future
= action by which humans or animals deliver a blow to an object with their hands, whether or not with the help of an instrument such as a hammer (הַלְמוּת) or with their feet
= the back part of the foot of humans and animals below the ankle

= large domesticated solid hoofed quadruped; stockily built in comparison to today's horses, with shorter heads and thicker necks; about 122–142 cm tall, and 2.1 m long; its coat varies from dark to pale brown; it eats plants; ◄ Equus caballus; ► used in battle, both to ride and for pulling chariots; ≈ symbolic of military might; associated with the sun, which was said to ride across the sky in a chariot
= action by which a horse walks at a fast pace, with all the feet off the ground together in each stride
= action by which a horse walks at a fast pace, with all the feet off the ground together in each stride
= male horse; ► mainly used for carrying soldiers and drawing chariots; ≈ associated with power, strength, and warfare

= to consign someone or something to death, damage, or destruction, usually by invoking the name of a deity if the agent is human; ◄ this is done as punishment, out of contempt, anger, or hostility, or because one was hired to do so
= town; ◄ north of Canaan (כְּנַעַן) ► cursed by Deborah (דְּבֹורָה) because of their unwillingness to help Barak (בָּרָק) army in their fight against the army of Sisera (סִיסְרָא)

Node.gloss: to say|to speak|to tell|to command|to think|to call
Node.definition: = action by which humans and deities utter words; this can happen within their minds and be inaudible to others, but in most cases the words are spoken out loud in order to communicate something to others; usually directly followed by the actual words that are spoken
= a human or supernatural being who carries a message on behalf of someone else
= deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses

= to consign someone or something to death, damage, or destruction, usually by invoking the name of a deity if the agent is human; ◄ this is done as punishment, out of contempt, anger, or hostility, or because one was hired to do so

= to consign someone or something to death, damage, or destruction, usually by invoking the name of a deity if the agent is human; ◄ this is done as punishment, out of contempt, anger, or hostility, or because one was hired to do so
= process by which humans make a certain place or area their home
= action by which humans or deities provide assistance or support to (other) humans (in both military and non military contexts) ► in order to make their life or work or task easier
= deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses
= action by which humans or deities provide assistance or support to (other) humans (in both military and non military contexts) ► in order to make their life or work or task easier
= deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses
= a human being, animal, or supernatural being who is renowned for his characteristics, such as physical strength, power, bravery, skill, wealth, good character, or a combination thereof

Node.gloss: to bless|to praise|to greet|to congratulate|to commend
Node.definition: = causative action by which deities grant a special favor to humans, objects, or events, or by which humans invoke a deity to do the same
= woman of marriagable age or older, whether married or not
= woman; ◄ wife of Heber (חֶבֶר) Kenite (קֵינִי) ► time of the Judges
= woman of marriagable age or older, whether married or not
= man; ◄ Kenite (קֵינִי)
= ethnic group; ◄ possibly descendants of Cain (קַיִן) ► ally of Israel (יִשְׂרָאֵל) associated with Moses (מֹשֶׁה) father in law
= woman of marriagable age or older, whether married or not
= construction ◄ made out of cloth or skins ► used as a temporary residence by nomads, soldiers, shepherds, and even as a sanctuary

Node.gloss: to bless|to praise|to greet|to congratulate|to commend
Node.definition: = causative action by which deities grant a special favor to humans, objects, or events, or by which humans invoke a deity to do the same

= white fluid; ◄ secreted by women and female mammals; ► for nourishment of their children or young; also used as food for humans; ≈ highly appreciated and considered high quality food; associated with delight, whiteness, purity, wealth, and well being; metaphor for beauty, young age; quality, wealth, and sex
= receptacle of undetermined size; ► used for drinking
= person in a position of leadership, either within the community or within the army
= causative action by which humans cause other humans or animals to move to a location relatively close to the location in focus

= coagulated substance; ◄ formed by action of acids on milk; ► made into cheese (חָרִיץ) or eaten as food; ≈ regarded as choice food and therefore often associated with prosperity; because of the smoothness of this substance it is sometimes associated with flattery and untrustworthiness as well

= the lower part of the upper limb of the human body, which in some contexts may include the full arm, ► apart from basic human activities such as holding, giving and taking, working, beating, also used in rituals around blessings, oaths, and prayer; ≈ used figuratively in expressions involving strength, control, responsibility, punishment; ≈ possibly used as a euphemism for the male genitals
= small, pointed object ► driven into a wall or the ground and used for hanging things on or securing something in place; ≈ associated with firmness and security

Node.gloss: to stretch out (one's) hand|to stretch out (one's) right hand|to lay (one's) hand
Node.definition: = action by which humans stretch out their hand, right hand, or finger in order to do point with it or to put it in position for another action
= the side of the human body which is to the south when facing the direction of the rising sun

= instrument of about 30 centimeters long, consisting of a handle, usually made of wood, to which was attached a stone, wooden, or (less frequently) metal head; ► used for many purposes, including the breaking or dressing of building stones, pounding nails or pegs into wood, or pounding pegs into the ground; also used by blacksmiths to shape hot metal
= action by which humans or animals deliver a blow to an object with their hands, whether or not with the help of an instrument such as a hammer (הַלְמוּת) or with their feet
= man; ► army commander of Jabin (יָבִין) king of Hazor (חָצֹור)
exact meaning unsure; probably: = causative action by which an object is deformed or pulverized by exerting heavy pressure on it

= upper part of the human body, or the front or upper part of the body of an animal, typically separated from the rest of the body by a neck, and containing the brain, mouth, and sense organs; ≈ associated with the entire person, that person's life, and that person's responsibilities
= action by which humans strike other humans or animals with a hammer, club or similar object, resulting in breaking the underlying bones
= process by which an object or substance passs through a certain location with strength
= the area separating two or mores locations

= the lower part of the lower limb of the body of humans, animals, and by extension of deities, which in some contexts may include the full leg; ► used for standing and walking; ≈ associated with authority, and also used as a euphemism for the male genitals
= process by which humans or animals sink on their knees ◄ as a result of being unable to keep standing up
literally: to fall; hence: = process by which humans are killed or severely wounded by enemies

= state or action by which a human being or animal is in or assumes a horizontal position; ► in order to rest, sleep, or have sex with someone, or because of being unable to stand up as a result of weakness or death; ≈ sometimes associated with security
= the area separating two or mores locations

= the lower part of the lower limb of the body of humans, animals, and by extension of deities, which in some contexts may include the full leg; ► used for standing and walking; ≈ associated with authority, and also used as a euphemism for the male genitals
= process by which humans or animals sink on their knees ◄ as a result of being unable to keep standing up
literally: to fall; hence: = process by which humans are killed or severely wounded by enemies
= a linker introducing a proposition that gives additional information regarding an explicit or implicit object, location, time, or manner
= process by which humans or animals sink on their knees ◄ as a result of being unable to keep standing up
literally: to fall; hence: = process by which humans are killed or severely wounded by enemies

Node.gloss: to ravage|to devastate|to lay waster|to plunder
Node.definition: = action by which humans or wild animals attack other humans and kill, destroy and steal in the process
= relation denoting that someone performs a certain event via the path of something else

= an opening ◄ in the wall of a building, ► which admits light and often air to a room and allows its occupants to look out, or objects within to be seen; in some cases they can be opened and closed; sometimes used as secret entrance or exit; ≈ has therefore some connonations of secrecy

Node.gloss: to gaze|to peer|to lament|to cry out
Node.definition: = action by which humans look intently in a certain direction|= action by which someone utters a cry, ► expressing feelings of concern
= direct female progenitor; ≈ associated with affection and loyalty; often extended figuratively to refer to other objects that are regarded as feminine
= man; ► army commander of Jabin (יָבִין) king of Hazor (חָצֹור)
= relation denoting that someone performs a certain event via the path of something else
= window with bars or strips crossing each other with spaces left between
= action by which someone takes much more time than expected to do something; ≈ possibly with an implicit connotation of bringing some sort of disappointment to those expecting
= a group of chariots (מֶרְכָּבָה) usually owned by one single person

Node.gloss: to be delayed|to linger|to be slow|to tarry
Node.definition: = to happen later than expected
= the act or movement of putting one foot in front of the other in walking
= open vehicle with two or four wheels, pulled by one or more horses; ◄ made or wood and iron; ► used in war or for travelling
= state in which humans, deities or animals have a certain level of wisdom, intelligence, or proficiency
= a woman of rank
= action in which humans or deities respond to a question or situation, either by words or by actions

marker pointing to information that needs to be considered in addition to previous information (either explicit or implied), and also often used to affirm this new information as more conclusive or compelling than the information preceding it
= referent to a female person or another object that is considered feminine
literally: to bring back; hence: = action by which humans or deities respond to (other) humans or deities in a direct conversation
= words spoken by humans and deities; often remembered and recorded
marker denoting that the truth value of the following statement is under investigation
= process by which humans or animals discover the person, animal, object or location they were looking for
= action by which humans divide an object (or range of objects) into portions and share them out among each other
literally: one or two wombs; hence: = female persons; ≈ probably a less respectful reference to female slaves or concubines as people you can have sex with and who may bear children for you
literally: one or two wombs; hence: = female persons; ≈ probably a less respectful reference to female slaves or concubines as people you can have sex with and who may bear children for you

= upper part of the human body, or the front or upper part of the body of an animal, typically separated from the rest of the body by a neck, and containing the brain, mouth, and sense organs; ≈ associated with the entire person, that person's life, and that person's responsibilities
= a male human
= dyed cloth of high quality; ≈ highly valued
= man; ► army commander of Jabin (יָבִין) king of Hazor (חָצֹור)
= dyed cloth of high quality; ≈ highly valued
= cloth with decorative patterns sewn into it by hand and therefore expensive; ≈ regarded as beautiful and valuable
= dyed cloth of high quality; ≈ highly valued
= cloth with decorative patterns sewn into it by hand and therefore expensive; ≈ regarded as beautiful and valuable
= part of the body connecting the rump to the head; ► a ;place to wear ornaments, but also a yoke; ≈ a stiff neck is associated with insolence and pride

Node.gloss: to vanish|to disappear|to be lost|to perish|to be broken|to be destroyed|to be ruined
Node.definition: = process by which humans or objects disappear or are removed from existence;◄ either by (a usually unnatural) death, aggression, hardship, disaster, natural processes, acts of destruction, or direct divine intervention
= person who has a conflict with someone else and acts accordingly
= deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses
= person to which one directs one's feelings of affection

Node.gloss: to go out|to come out|to go away|to leave|to depart
Node.definition: = action by which humans, animals, or objects leave a certain place or position
= the ability to accomplish great things because of characteristics, such as physical strength, power, bravery, skill, wealth, good character, or a combination thereof
= state in which there is no activity of a certain kind in a certain place

= the earth as opposed to the sky; sometimes used in a more specific sense to denote part of the earth, such as the dry land as opposed to the sea, or a specific region, area, country, or plot of land
= state in which a countable entity is forty in number
